scripts.prod:lambda:push-to-s3: s3bucketname=$(aws cloudformation list-exports --query "Exports[?Name=='turkana-s3bucket-name'].Value | [0]" --output text) && aws s3 cp azdev-adapter-webhook.zip s3://${s3bucketname}/private/prod/azdev-adapter-webhook/azdev-adapter-webhook.zip
scripts.prod:lambda:update: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run pack && npm run prod:lambda:push-to-s3 && arn=$(aws cloudformation list-exports --query "Exports[?Name=='turkana-prod-prod-azdev-adapter-webhook-arn'].Value | [0]" --output text) && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${arn} --zip-file fileb://azdev-adapter-webhook.zip
scripts.prod:lambda:pre-seed: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run pack && npm run prod:lambda:push-to-s3
scripts.dev:lambda:push-to-s3: s3bucketname=$(aws cloudformation list-exports --query "Exports[?Name=='turkana-s3bucket-name'].Value | [0]" --output text) && aws s3 cp azdev-adapter-webhook.zip s3://${s3bucketname}/private/dev/azdev-adapter-webhook/azdev-adapter-webhook.zip
scripts.dev:lambda:update: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run pack && npm run dev:lambda:push-to-s3 && arn=$(aws cloudformation list-exports --query "Exports[?Name=='turkana-dev-prod-azdev-adapter-webhook-arn'].Value | [0]" --output text) && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${arn} --zip-file fileb://azdev-adapter-webhook.zip
scripts.dev:lambda:pre-seed: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run pack && npm run dev:lambda:push-to-s3
